document_data.name: ''Potion of Shield of Faith''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of shield of faith''''', also known as '''''armor of faith potions''''', were magic concoctions that created protective shell around the imbiber.
document_data.Description: ''Potions of shield of faith'' were kept in corked crystal phials.
document_data.Powers: When consumed, the potion formed a magical barrier around the imbiber that took the shape of enchanted [[armor]] that protected them from harm and gave them some protection from magic. The effects of the potions were similar to those of the ''[[shield of faith]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''potions of shield of faith'' were used by the members of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] who occupied the ruined elven city of [[Myth Drannor]].
